content.text:
# Democratic Republic of the Congo at the 2011 World Championships in Athletics

}}
The Democratic Republic of the Congo competed at the 2011 World Championships in Athletics from August 27 to September 4 in Daegu, South Korea.
A team of 2 athletes was
announced to represent the country
in the event.
